A Time to Write

I’ve thought about writing and maintaining a blog for many years, but it just never seemed like the payoff was going to be there for me. Every month, or few weeks, or few years, I would tell myself “this would be great blog content, if…”

January 06, 2017

Hi, my name is Alan and I've been working in Graphic Design and Software Development since 2005. I’ve worked for corporations, small businesses and silicon valley startups. I have a background is in graphic design, photography, javascript development, teaching, events and more.

I’m based in Detroit, Michigan.
